data.eml:eml: Description of Notoglanidium pembetadi new species (Siluriformes: Claroteidae) from the Kouilou-Niari River, Republic of the Congo

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vreven, Emmanuel, Zamba, Armel Ibala, Mamonekene, Victor, Geerinckx, Tom (2013): Description of Notoglanidium pembetadi new species (Siluriformes: Claroteidae) from the Kouilou-Niari River, Republic of the Congo. Zootaxa 3691 (1): 153-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.1.6
